frontmatter.description: Where you goin' with that gun of yours?
frontmatter.title: Hey Joe

frontmatter.description: Spend his whole life in disguise?
frontmatter.title: What makes a man?

frontmatter.description: And it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring
frontmatter.title: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius

frontmatter.description: That sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying
frontmatter.title: I am so clever

frontmatter.description: But people will never forget how you made them feel.
frontmatter.title: People will forget what you said, people will forget what you did

frontmatter.description: But if you do it right, once is enough
frontmatter.title: You only live once

frontmatter.description: Because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind
frontmatter.title: Be who you are

frontmatter.description: And I'm not sure about the universe.
frontmatter.title: Two things are infinite

frontmatter.description: So say goodbye to love and hold your head up high
frontmatter.title: Waiting to die
